channel.title: What Would You do in a Post-Apocalyptic Planet
channel.description: I guess the -long- title explains it. I would blow up a city built around an atomic bomb, then enslave everyone I see with a cool gun. Wait...

item.title: What Would You do in a Post-Apocalyptic Planet
item.dc:creator: DansonDelta40
item.description:
This, bscly. Maybe even a little bit of this. Or, if I get seriously unlucky, even this. Hopefully not this. Although very likely.

But propably I would just die.

item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:

item.title: What Would You do in a Post-Apocalyptic Planet
item.dc:creator: Hazzmat
item.description:
First I’d call some druids of the wild to restore a patch of land for me like it was before the apocalypse. Then I’d call all the good people I know and built a great city there with all the luxaries a real city has. It will also have rules and order. I will call it New Podgorica. From there I expand. While druids restore more and more lands we make use of it for more farmlands which attracts even more people. Eventually I’ll raise more cities like this and then the world will be mine. I will be bathed in glory forever.

Read full topic
item.source: What Would You do in a Post-Apocalyptic Planet

item.title: What Would You do in a Post-Apocalyptic Planet
item.dc:creator: Tosser_Sloth
item.description:
i’d use a tarpaulin a lot to shelter me and my son and i’d scavenge the barren grey landscape for anything humane and useful.
sighting any people i’d be very careful and go by the ‘it’s me or him’ attitude by default.
the soft ashes would swirl along the brittle paving and the trees would perplex and obscure with impenetrable shadows.
we would head south, because there’s no surviving another winter here.

we would keep off road, to not be seen, and we would persist because we carry the fire.

Read full topic
item.source: What Would You do in a Post-Apocalyptic Planet

item.title: What Would You do in a Post-Apocalyptic Planet
item.dc:creator: Tosser_Sloth
item.description:
I bestride streetlights, past pestilent waters
Seven dashes of ash, the sun shines
I write a poem, cabbage pudding lenience

Crossing streets I cower, past imminent slaughter
Dreaded probing bats, i eat wormhole dotted apples
Stars fall from afar, sweeps by glowing radiant

Read full topic
item.source: What Would You do in a Post-Apocalyptic Planet

item.title: What Would You do in a Post-Apocalyptic Planet
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
Well, if I’m alive after the apocalypse, and if I’m young, attractive and kind of awkward and unskilled (or else a grizzled veteran, or an energetic young girl, or a man trying to protect his family, or a jokester, or a silent mysterious badass, or Will Smith), then I guess I’ll have to go uncover some mysteries and save the world.

Read full topic
item.source: What Would You do in a Post-Apocalyptic Planet
